Quality is all we are after

With over 25 years experiences in the industry, we provide prompt, reliable and personal roofing services and solutions at an affordable price to Sydney-wide.

SERVICES

All our roofing work is carried out by fully licensed and insured tradesmen in accordance with industry Occupational Health and Safety Standards.
We guarantee all repairs for 2 years and all new roofs for 7 years.

ABOUT US

We are licensed in roof tiling and roof plumbing.

TP Roofing is a family owned and operated business established by Trent Faulkner. Trent is renowned in the industry for his honesty, integrity, hard work and experience in the field.

TP Roofing are members of the Master Tilers and Slaters Association and were hand-picked to join the CSR Roofing Specialists, an elite team of roofing companies giving us the ability to offer you Monier terracotta and concrete tiles at competitive prices. CSR also provide invaluable technical product support and advice.

We also ensure that we respect your property, paying particular care with your lawn and gardens, and removing all debris and waste on completion of the job.

TESTIMONIALS

Our clients include Property Managers, Strata Managers, builders and residential clients.
